jobs_results.title: Mobile Software Engineer 2 iOS - Delivery Experience
jobs_results.description:
The salary range for this position is PLNin gross terms (contract of employment taxdeductible cost)

Additionally depending on your annual assessment and the companys results:

Annual bonus up to 10% of the annual salary gross

A hybrid work model requires 1 or 2 days a week in the office.

As part of the Mobile DEX (Delivery Experience) team you will work on one of the industrys largest and most modularized codebases. Mobile DEX is focused on helping users choose the best delivery method keeping track of parcels and picking them up from various places using multiple methods. We are not only implementing new features but also working on improving the whole process delivering innovative solutions and keeping the codebase clean and scalable. You will be working with a team of skilled mobile engineers with high seniority level.

You will also be part of Allegros mobile community composed of more than 100 mobile developers. In our community we actively share knowledge as part of our daily code review work and at dedicated company events. We have time dedicated to knowledge sharing as well as opportunities for teambuilding and listening to inspiring guests from outside the company.

We are looking for developers who:
• Are passionate about mobile application development
• Know the iOS system very well both from the developer and user perspective
• Are proficient in and use frameworks for creating application interfaces UIKit and SwiftUI and have experience with Combine Async/Await MVVM. Experience with watchOS SPM Redux Bazel Xcodegen is a plus
• Are eager to learn and adapt to new technologies
• Want to develop and update their knowledge constantly
• Possess strong problemsolving skills and the ability to think critically
• Understand the app development process from design to releasing it to the App Store
• Care about the quality and cleanliness of the code (knowledge of the Clean Architecture solutions is welcome)
• Have an open approach curiosity and willingness to ask questions (our work goes beyond writing code consultations education and looking for alternative solutions are part of our daily routine)
• Want to be proud of the code they create. They willingly accept comments and share knowledge during code reviews
• Know English at least at B2 level

What we offer:
• A hybrid work model that you will agree on with your leader and the team. We have welllocated offices (with fully equipped kitchens and bicycle parking facilities) and excellent working tools (heightadjustable desks interactive conference rooms)
• Annual bonus of up to 10% of the annual salary gross (depending on your annual assessment and the companys results)
• A wide selection of fringe benefits in a cafeteria plan you choose what you like (e.g. medical sports or lunch packages insurance purchase vouchers)
• English classes that we pay for related to the specific nature of your job
• 16 or 14 MacBook Pro with Apple Silicon processor and 36GB RAM and other gadgets that you may need
• Working in a team you can always count on we have on board topclass specialists and experts in their areas of expertise
• A high degree of autonomy in terms of organizing your teams work; we encourage you to develop continuously and try out new things
• Hackathons internal mobile conference DevDay team tourism (possibility to work in another team for a while) training budget and an internal educational platform MindUp (including training courses on organizational work means of communications and various technologies and subjectmatter issues)
• If you want to learn more check it out

This may also be of interest to you

Allegro Tech Podcast

Send in your CV and see why it is #dobrzetuby (#goodtobehere)

Remote Work :

No

Employment Type :

Fulltime

jobs_results.title: Mobile app developer iOS
jobs_results.description:
Mobile app developer iOS

Miejsce pracy: Poznań

Technologie, których używamy

Wymagane
• iOS
• SwiftUI
• Combine
• XCTest
• UIKit
• CocoaPods
• Alamofire
• Swift

O projekcie

Wspólnie z naszym Partnerem, liderem w transformacji cyfrowej w branży finansowej, poszukujemy osoby na stanowisko iOS Developer✨

Projekt dotyczy rozwoju aplikacji mobilnej – dodawania nowych funkcjonalności oraz dostosowywania jej do potrzeb osób z niepełnosprawnościami, zgodnie z zasadami WCAG.

Lokalizacja do wyboru: możesz przyjeżdżać 1x w miesiącu do jednego z naszych biur w Warszawie lub Poznaniu.

Twój zakres obowiązków
• Tworzenie interfejsów do komunikacji z backendowymi systemami bankowymi w celu pobierania danych o kontach, transakcjach,
• Projektowanie i implementacja nowych ekranów w aplikacji, takich jak przelewy, płatności, czy zarządzanie kartami,
• Aktualizowanie aplikacji, aby działała poprawnie na najnowszych wersjach systemu operacyjnego,
• Zwiększanie dostępności aplikacji dla osób z niepełnosprawnościami,
• Implementacja nowych usług.

Nasze wymagania
• Minimum 3-letnie doświadczenie komercyjne na stanowisku iOS Developer,
• Znajomość frameworka SwiftUI, Combine, XCTest, UIKit,
• Doświadczenie w pracy z CocoaPods oraz Alamofire,
• Bardzo dobra znajomość języka Swift,
• Dobra znajomość języka angielskiego.

Tak organizujemy naszą pracę

Tak pracujemy
• wewnątrz organizacji

Takie dajemy możliwości rozwoju
• wymiana wiedzy technicznej w firmie

To oferujemy
• Możliwość uczestnictwa w spotkaniach integracyjnych oraz meetupach technologicznych, gdzie będziesz mógł/mogła dzielić się wiedzą i doświadczeniem,
• Wsparcie indywidulanego opiekuna ds. kadr i HR, który zawsze jest dostępny, by pomóc Ci w sprawach związanych z pracą,
• Angażujące projekty, które wpływają na rozwój produktów i usług w sektorze finansowym,
• Praca z innowacyjnymi rozwiązaniami oraz najnowszymi technologiami w branży,
• Stabilne i długoterminowe zatrudnienie w firmie o ugruntowanej pozycji na rynku,
• 5000PLN za polecenie znajomego do któregokolwiek z naszych projektów,
• Możliwość rozwoju zawodowego i udziału w interesujących projektach,
• Szybki, zdalny proces rekrutacyjny.

Etapy rekrutacji
• 10-minutowa rozmowa telefoniczna po stronie Connectis
• Rozmowa z działem HR po stronie Connectis
• Rozmowa techniczna po stronie Klienta

Jeśli chcesz być częścią innowacyjnego zespołu, który wyznacza nowe standardy w branży finansowej, czekamy na Twoją aplikację!

Dziękujemy za wszystkie zgłoszenia. Pragniemy poinformować, że skontaktujemy się z wybranymi kandydatami.

Connectis_

Connectis_ to ponad 20 lat doświadczenia w branży, 60.000 Specjalistów IT i tysiące projektów zrealizowanych w 14 krajach.

jobs_results.title: Remote Senior IOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Programista Senior IOS

Miejsce pracy Hybrydowo/ Warszawa

Rodzaj zatrudnienia B2B

Opis oferty Dla naszego klienta z branży finansowej szukamy Programisty Senior IOS

Zakres obowiązków

Na co dzień w naszym zespole:

• uczestniczysz w innowacyjnych projektach dla największej aplikacji mobilnej bankowości w kraju,

• wykonujesz integrację z systemami backend,

• przygotowujesz testy jednostkowe,

• zawsze dbasz o jakość kodu i zgodność z dobrymi praktykami programowania,

• przygotowujesz lub aktualizujesz dokumentację techniczną.

Poszukiwane kompetencje

To stanowisko może być Twoje, jeśli:

• masz min. 4 lata doświadczenia w zakresie programowania na platformę iOS (Swift i Objective-C),

• znasz Xcode, CocoaPods, SwiftLint,

• znasz wzorce projektowe,

• korzystasz z systemu kontroli wersji Git,

• znasz zagadnienia z technologii dependency injection,

• rozumiesz jak działają aplikacje wielomodułowe na ios, brałeś/brałaś udział w modularyzacji aplikacji

• testujesz swój kod,

• posiadasz umiejętności analitycznego myślenia i rozwiązywania problemów,

• lubisz pracować w zespole, ale również dobrze sobie radzisz w pracy samodzielnej oraz pracy zdalnej.

Twoim dodatkowym atutem będzie:

• znajomość natywnego programowania na platformę iOS z wykorzystaniem C/C++,

• znajomość Gerrit, Gitlab, procesu GitFlow,

• znajomość zagadnień związanych z procesem CI/CD oraz narzędzi typu Jenkins, wiedza o działaniu fastlane, codesign,

• doświadczenie w zarządzaniu aplikacją w sklepie AppStore oraz zarządzaniu kontem na ProvisioningPortal,

• doświadczenie w stosowaniu SOLID,

• doświadczenie w korzystaniu z JIRA/Confluence

Oferujemy
• umowa B2B
• praca zdalna
• opcjonalnie pakiet Lux Med

jobs_results.title: iOS Engineer senior
jobs_results.description:
About the role:

At Tango, we build digital apps and platforms. Startups that we launched include Talixo - our ground transportation startup serving 1M customers yearly in over 100 countries and Kalamba Games - an innovative studio building games in React.js.

Key responsibilities:

As an iOS Developer, you will work closely with our cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain high-quality iOS applications. This is a fantastic opportunity to contribute to exciting projects, enhance your skills, and be an integral part of a company that values innovation and excellence.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
• Develop and maintain high-performance, reusable, and reliable Swift code.
• Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
What you need to succeed:
• Computer science fundamentals including data structures and design patterns (MVVM+C)
• Knowledge of Swift
• Understanding of iOS SDK
• Experience with git, branch management, creation of pull requests, conflict resolution
• Understanding of common back-end system integration/web services/APIs
• Familiarity with Agile development and lean principles
• Strong communication skills, written and verbal (English, B2/C1)

We work in an iterative agile process based on bi-weekly sprints. You will be collaborating with industry-leading experts who will assist you with planning and code reviews.

jobs_results.title: Computer Scientist (m/f/d) as App Developer for iOS / Android
jobs_results.description:
Computer Scientist (m/f/d) as App Developer for iOS / Android
RIWA - All geoinformation becomes a digital experience

RIWA GmbH is a leading company in the field of geoinformation and municipal specialist processes with over 25 years of experience and market leader in Bavaria. Our team develops innovative solutions for the digital transformation of cities and municipalities, in particular through geographic information systems (GIS). We also create digital twins of municipalities for construction planning, energy management and sustainable urban development. We offer customized solutions and attach great importance to close cooperation.

Become part of our team in one of our branches in Augsburg, Memmingen or Kempten im AllgÃ¤u. After training, you can also work from home.
These are your tasks
• Further development of our native RIWA GIS Android app
• Implementation of our previous apps for Apple iOS with Kotlin & Compose Multiplatform
• Quality assurance through code reviews, unit tests and automated test procedures
• Technical conceptualization of functional requirements from product management
• Advising product management on development issues
You know your way around this
• Completed studies in computer science or equivalent training
• Sound knowledge in the development of Android apps (Kotlin, Java, Android SDK). Basic knowledge of iOS development advantageous (Swift)
• Ideally experience with Jetpack Compose, Kotlin Multiplatform and Compose Multiplatform
• Expertise with automated tests, CI/CD processes and agile software development
• Knowledge of designing appealing user interfaces is a plus
• Independent working style, ability to work in a team and a high level of self-motivation
What we offer you
• A great team - #GernePerDu - and a varied job in the office and home office
• Attractive salary, 13 monthly salaries, capital-forming benefits and a performance bonus
• Family-friendly working time models with flexible working hours (flexitime)
• Corporate benefits such as a job bike, drinks flat rate or employee discounts with over 1,500 providers
• Intensive training in the field of activity and regular further training
• An exciting environment with varied tasks
• A secure, modern workplace close to the city center with future prospects
Have we piqued your interest?

Please send us your complete application documents directly online via our applicant management system, stating your salary expectations and the earliest possible starting date.
RIWA GmbH

An der NeumÃ¼hle 5, 87700 Memmingen
Everyone is welcome at RIWA. Diversity and equal opportunities are an integral part of our company. We see the uniqueness of each individual, and therefore the diversity of our teams, as the driving force behind our daily work and innovations. - We look forward to meeting you.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer (React Native, JavaScript/TypeScript) - Remote
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Bulgaria, Poland, Romania, South Africa, Portugal, Spain, Slovakia

Join Us at IQVIA!

We are looking for talented individuals to join our team and help us revolutionize patient care with our electronic clinical outcome assessment (eCOA) platform. Our fast, flexible, and proven solution enhances efficiencies, delivers real-time data, and sharpens insights, all while providing a superior patient experience.

Who we’re looking for:

You will be part of a growing team of developers located across the world, focused on building new and modern software that’s positioned to disrupt the clinical trial space. In this remote role, you’ll be empowered and encouraged to think “outside the box” to develop innovative solutions to drive business and the industry forward. You believe that pushing yourself out of your comfort zone is the only way to grow. You love the idea of owning a product, from developing new mobile app features to scaling to meet market demands. Not only are you fluent with React Native, but you’re an expert with JavaScript/TypeScript.

Position overview:

We’re seeing immense growth in the industry, and our core focus is scaling our native application’s feature set. Bring your talent and drive to our team of passionate, creative, and innovative thinkers, focused on developing a sophisticated product that uses modern JavaScript. We have the support and resources of a large company but operate with a start-up culture. You’ll thrive in a fast-paced and agile environment, during which you see real-time results. As we work to rapidly expand our team, you’ll have the opportunity to grow your career in the direction that’s right for you.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Serve as critical development resource on cross platform mobile application
• Work collaboratively and efficiently across functional teams in a fast-paced startup-like environment.
• High standard of engineering quality through source control, code reviews, continuous integration, and unit tests.
• Extend our platform to handle an expanding set of features.
• Improve infrastructure and application development
• Review and refactor legacy code
• Provide input on the establishment of development best practices and standards for the organization

SKILLS:
• Expert in React Native, React, and Redux
• Expert in JavaScript and TypeScript
• Experience with SQL databases (SQLite/Postgres)
• Experience with Swift, Objective-C, Java, and Kotlin are a plus
• Experience with mobile application deployments (Android/iOS)
• Experience with data/event streams (Amazon Kinesis/Apache Pulsar)

IQVIA is a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries. We create intelligent connections to accelerate the development and commercialization of innovative medical treatments to help improve patient outcomes and population health worldwide. Learn more at https://jobs.iqvia.com

At IQVIA, we believe that diversity, inclusion, and belonging empower our mission to accelerate innovation for a healthier world. We create a culture of belonging by valuing the perspectives of all talented employees worldwide and providing them with the opportunity to power smarter healthcare for everyone, everywhere. When our talented employees bring their authentic selves and their diverse experiences to work, they enable us to accomplish extraordinary things. Multifaceted thought processes spark innovation. Multi-talented collaboration harnesses innovation to deliver superior outcomes.

This offer from "IQVIA" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 79% flex score.
